text: Kasoa Interchange is an ongoing project to ease the vehicular congestion on the Accra-Cape Coast highway. ==Scope== The project has been divided into three phases. In all a new 33 kilometer Kasoa-Oboum road will be constructed. There will be an interchange constructed at the Kasoa Junction. The project also includes a two 12-classroom blocks, 12-unit class room blocks, one polyclinic with all accessories, 10 mechanized bore-holes, and 20 kilometer of local roads would be constructed around Kasoa area, as well as a walk-over at Iron City. ==References== Category:Roads in Ghana Category:Road interchanges
title: Kasoa Interchange
